title: hammondIntro
body:
<< headSprites hammond>> 
Hello everyone, I hope you all have had a safe flight. We have alot to show you here. 
You will travel back to the Prehistoric Era with what you will witness today. 
Have some time to settle in and be ready to leave the Lodge soon for the tour!  
Also everyone, please keep in mind....  
This park is near and dear to me, so please treat it with respect.
With that said...
<< introSpeechFinished >>
Welcome everyone, to [color=#eef704]Jurrassic Park[/color]!  
And you! Umm....  
What was your name again?  
You know what forget it!
I can't even remember half of the faces that I hire!
I'll just call you [color=#eef704]Techy[/color].
Being the new technician, you are going to fix any electrical issues the park may encounter. 
[color=#eef704]Ed Regis[/color], with the [color=#eef704]sunglasses[/color], will give you a tour around the Lodge, where most of the operations take place. 
Before you're off, make sure not to [color=#eef704]hurt[/color] any of MY [color=#eef704]dinosaurs[/color].
It is park property and costs alot of money. Anyways, welcome aboard the Jurassic Park team!

title: doorOne
body: The door seems to be automatic or may be controlled remotely.

title: plantOne
body:
In front of you appears to be a gianormous plant much taller than yourself.
There also seems to be a plaque right next to it.
It says "Do NOT touch the plants!"
[[ Touch It: |plantTouched]]
[[ Don't Touch It: |plantNotTouched]]

title: plantTouched
body:
You reach in to touch the plant and...
<< peeled>> fail to see the banana that you end up slipping on.
Everyone saw it and it was hilarious.

title: plantNotTouched
body:
You decided to obey the law of the sign and walked away...
<< peeled>> But then you accidentally slip on a banana peel and touch it anyways
<< headSprites arnold>> what the hell technician!
I specifically put that sign there for a reason!
Huh? A banana peel?
Yeah right, i'll believe it when I see it.

title: plantTwo
body: You lost your plant appetite and deem plants as your mortal enemy.
